escjava.dfa.daganalysis
Class AlgebraUtils

java.lang.Object
  escjava.dfa.daganalysis.AlgebraUtils

public class AlgebraUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
Mikolas Janota This class encapsulates algebra-like operations on expressions and related data-structures.

relevantVariablesSplit

public static void relevantVariablesSplit(QuantifiedExpr qe,
                                          javafe.ast.GenericVarDeclVec relevantVars,
                                          javafe.ast.GenericVarDeclVec nonRelevantVars)
For a given quantified expression, the variables that are quantified over are split into two sets according to whether they are relevant or irrelevant to the inside of the quantified expression.

Parameters:
qe - the quantified expression to be tested
relevantVars - to this vector the relevant vars will be added
nonRelevantVars - to this vector the irelevant vars will be added
